prompts: Create a majestic dragon-type Pokemon with fluffy white clouds surrounding it.
I want an elegant bird Pokemon that has a vibrant blue body and soft white feathers.
Generate a serene cloud-like creature that can soar through the sky effortlessly.
Make a whimsical flying Pokemon that resembles a mix of a dragon and a bird.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies harmony with nature, featuring soft textures and soothing colors.
Design a graceful Pokemon that dances in the air with its fluffy wings.
Show me a sky-dwelling Pokemon that radiates calmness and beauty with its colors.
